name: Baby games for 2 to 4 year olds
name_original: Baby games for 2 to 4 year olds
description:
Kids's educational games for children from 2 to 5 years. 15 educational preschool games for kids on the development of fine motor skills, coordination, logical thinking and visual perception. Games will help boys and girls in developing basic skills and pre-school education.

Our children's app includes:
- Kids's games for the development of logic
- Games for kids to enhance memory
- Puzzles for children
- Learn the numbers for the smallest
- Develops attention and perception
- Educational games for children from 2 to 5 years

Our children's learning games will appeal to both girls and boys.

Age: 2, 3, 4 and 5 years. Preschool education.

You will never find annoying ads inside our app. We are always glad to receive your feedback and suggestions.
developers: Bimi Boo Kids - Games for boys and girls
